price: 105. Osili kokokisa (elaka) ya ndoto, lolenge wana nde tofutaka babongisi.
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
